mapper.select: SELECT userid, musicid, version, patterncode, playtime, cleartime, rank, rate, ratenx, rateex, ratemx, ratetbre, ratetb, score, combo, checkfc, meter FROM skill WHERE musicid = #{musicid} AND userid = #{userid} AND patterncode = #{ptcode}

SELECT s.userid as userid, m.id as musicid, m.version as version, s.patterncode as patterncode, s.playtime as playtime, s.cleartime as cleartime, s.rank as rank, s.rate as rate, s.ratenx as ratenx, s.rateex as rateex, s.ratemx as ratemx, s.ratetbre as ratetbre, s.ratetb as ratetb, s.score as score, s.combo as combo, s.checkfc as checkfc, s.meter as meter, CASE WHEN s.patterncode = 1 THEN m.gbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 2 THEN m.gadv WHEN s.patterncode = 3 THEN m.gext WHEN s.patterncode = 4 THEN m.gmas WHEN s.patterncode = 5 THEN m.bbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 6 THEN m.badv WHEN s.patterncode = 7 THEN m.bext WHEN s.patterncode = 8 THEN m.bmas WHEN s.patterncode = 9 THEN m.dbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 10 THEN m.dadv WHEN s.patterncode = 11 THEN m.dext WHEN s.patterncode = 12 THEN m.dmas END AS level FROM skill as s, music as m WHERE s.musicid = m.id AND s.musicid = #{musicid} AND s.userid = #{userid}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.id as musicid, m.name as mname, m.hurigana as hurigana, m.hot as ishot, s.patterncode as patterncode, s.rank as rank, s.rate as rate, s.ratenx as ratenx, s.rateex as rateex, s.ratemx as ratemx, s.ratetbre as ratetbre, s.ratetb as ratetb, m.version as version, s.combo as combo, s.playtime as playtime, CASE WHEN s.patterncode = 1 THEN m.gbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 2 THEN m.gadv WHEN s.patterncode = 3 THEN m.gext WHEN s.patterncode = 4 THEN m.gmas WHEN s.patterncode = 5 THEN m.bbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 6 THEN m.badv WHEN s.patterncode = 7 THEN m.bext WHEN s.patterncode = 8 THEN m.bmas WHEN s.patterncode = 9 THEN m.dbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 10 THEN m.dadv WHEN s.patterncode = 11 THEN m.dext WHEN s.patterncode = 12 THEN m.dmas END AS level, s.checkfc as checkfc, s.meter as meter FROM skill as s, music as m WHERE s.musicid = m.id AND s.userid = #{userid}
AND s.patterncode <= 8
AND s.patterncode >= 9
AND (
s.rank = #{ritem}
)
AND (
s.version = #{vitem}
)
AND m.hot = "Y"
AND m.hot = "N"
) a
WHERE (
(level >= #{litem} AND level < #{litem}+50)
)
ORDER BY
rate*level DESC
rate*level ASC
hurigana ASC
hurigana DESC
version ASC
version DESC
rate ASC
rate DESC
playtime DESC

select s.musicid as musicid, m.name as mname, m.hurigana as hurigana, m.hot as ishot, s.patterncode as patterncode, s.rank as rank, s.rate as rate, s.ratenx as ratenx, s.rateex as rateex, s.ratemx as ratemx, s.ratetbre as ratetbre, s.ratetb as ratetb, m.version as version, s.combo as combo, s.playtime as playtime, CASE WHEN s.patterncode = 1 THEN m.gbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 2 THEN m.gadv WHEN s.patterncode = 3 THEN m.gext WHEN s.patterncode = 4 THEN m.gmas WHEN s.patterncode = 5 THEN m.bbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 6 THEN m.badv WHEN s.patterncode = 7 THEN m.bext WHEN s.patterncode = 8 THEN m.bmas WHEN s.patterncode = 9 THEN m.dbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 10 THEN m.dadv WHEN s.patterncode = 11 THEN m.dext WHEN s.patterncode = 12 THEN m.dmas END AS level, s.checkfc as checkfc, s.meter as meter from skill s
inner join music m
inner join music_tb m
inner join music_tbre m
inner join music_mx m
inner join music_ex m
inner join music_nx m
on s.musicid = m.id and s.userid = #{userid}
and rate > 0
and ratetb > 0
and ratetbre > 0
and ratemx > 0
and rateex > 0
and ratenx > 0
where
patterncode <= 8
patterncode >= 9
order by rate*level desc
order by ratetb*level desc
order by ratetbre*level desc
order by ratemx*level desc
order by rateex*level desc
order by ratenx*level desc
limit 100

SELECT sa.musicid, sa.mname, sa.hurigana, sa.ishot, sa.patterncode, sa.rank, sa.rate, sa.ratenx, sa.rateex, sa.ratemx, sa.ratetbre, sa.ratetb, sa.version, sa.combo, sa.playtime, sa.level, sa.checkfc, sa.meter FROM (SELECT *,
a.level*a.rate*20 AS skill
a.level*a.ratetb*20 AS skill
a.level*a.ratetbre*20 AS skill
a.level*a.ratemx*20 AS skill
a.level*a.rateex*20 AS skill
a.level*a.ratenx*20 AS skill
FROM (SELECT m.name as mname, m.hurigana as hurigana, m.id as musicid, m.hot as ishot, s.patterncode as patterncode, s.rank as rank, s.rate as rate, s.ratenx as ratenx, s.rateex as rateex, s.ratemx as ratemx, s.ratetbre as ratetbre, s.ratetb as ratetb, m.version as version, s.playtime as playtime, s.cleartime as cleartime, s.combo as combo, CASE WHEN s.patterncode = 1 THEN m.gbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 2 THEN m.gadv WHEN s.patterncode = 3 THEN m.gext WHEN s.patterncode = 4 THEN m.gmas WHEN s.patterncode = 5 THEN m.bbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 6 THEN m.badv WHEN s.patterncode = 7 THEN m.bext WHEN s.patterncode = 8 THEN m.bmas WHEN s.patterncode = 9 THEN m.dbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 10 THEN m.dadv WHEN s.patterncode = 11 THEN m.dext WHEN s.patterncode = 12 THEN m.dmas END AS level, s.checkfc as checkfc, s.meter as meter FROM skill as s,
music as m
music_tb as m
music_tbre as m
music_mx as m
music_ex as m
music_nx as m
WHERE s.musicid = m.id
AND m.removed < 1
AND (m.removed < 1 OR m.removed > #{version})
AND s.userid = #{userid}
AND m.hot = "Y"
AND m.hot = "N"
AND s.patterncode <= 8
AND s.patterncode >= 9
AND s.rate > 0
AND s.ratetb > 0
AND s.ratetbre > 0
AND s.ratemx > 0
AND s.rateex > 0
AND s.ratenx > 0
) a ) sa INNER JOIN (SELECT a.musicid,
MAX(a.level*a.rate*20) AS skill
MAX(a.level*a.ratetb*20) AS skill
MAX(a.level*a.ratetbre*20) AS skill
MAX(a.level*a.ratemx*20) AS skill
MAX(a.level*a.rateex*20) AS skill
MAX(a.level*a.ratenx*20) AS skill
FROM (SELECT m.id as musicid, m.hot as ishot, s.patterncode as patterncode, s.rank as rank, s.rate as rate, s.ratenx as ratenx, s.rateex as rateex, s.ratemx as ratemx, s.ratetbre as ratetbre, s.ratetb as ratetb, m.version as version, s.playtime as playtime, s.cleartime as cleartime, s.combo as combo, CASE WHEN s.patterncode = 1 THEN m.gbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 2 THEN m.gadv WHEN s.patterncode = 3 THEN m.gext WHEN s.patterncode = 4 THEN m.gmas WHEN s.patterncode = 5 THEN m.bbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 6 THEN m.badv WHEN s.patterncode = 7 THEN m.bext WHEN s.patterncode = 8 THEN m.bmas WHEN s.patterncode = 9 THEN m.dbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 10 THEN m.dadv WHEN s.patterncode = 11 THEN m.dext WHEN s.patterncode = 12 THEN m.dmas END AS level, s.checkfc as checkfc, s.meter as meter FROM skill as s,
music as m
music_tb as m
music_tbre as m
music_mx as m
music_ex as m
music_nx as m
WHERE s.musicid = m.id
AND m.removed < 1
AND (m.removed < 1 OR m.removed > #{version})
AND s.userid = #{userid}
AND m.hot = "Y"
AND m.hot = "N"
AND s.patterncode <= 8
AND s.patterncode >= 9
AND s.rate > 0
AND s.ratetb > 0
AND s.ratetbre > 0
AND s.ratemx > 0
AND s.rateex > 0
AND s.ratenx > 0
) a GROUP BY musicid ) sb WHERE sa.skill = sb.skill AND sa.musicid = sb.musicid GROUP BY sa.musicid ORDER BY sa.skill DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT p.id as userid, p.name as name,
s.rate as rate,
s.ratenx as rate,
s.rateex as rate,
s.ratemx as rate,
s.ratetbre as rate,
s.ratetb as rate,
s.checkfc as checkfc, s.rank as rank FROM skill as s

, profile as p USE INDEX (id_name) WHERE s.musicid=#{mid} AND s.patterncode=#{p} AND s.userid=p.id

s.ratenx
s.rateex
s.ratemx
s.ratetbre
s.ratetb
DESC

SELECT p.id as userid, p.name as name, s.rate as rate, s.checkfc as checkfc, s.rank as rank FROM skill as s INNER JOIN ( SELECT id, name, token FROM profile WHERE id=#{uid} ) p ON s.userid=p.id WHERE s.musicid=#{mid} AND s.patterncode=#{p} AND s.rate > 0 LIMIT 1

patterncode < 9

INSERT INTO skill ( userid, musicid, version, patterncode, playtime, cleartime, rank, rate, score, combo, checkfc, meter ) VALUES
( #{item.userid}, #{item.musicid}, #{item.version}, #{item.patterncode}, #{item.playtime}, #{item.cleartime}, #{item.rank}, #{item.rate}, #{item.score}, #{item.combo}, #{item.checkfc}, #{item.meter} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE playtime = VALUES(playtime), cleartime = VALUES(cleartime), rank = VALUES(rank), rate = VALUES(rate), score = VALUES(score), combo = VALUES(combo), checkfc = VALUES(checkfc), meter = VALUES(meter)

INSERT INTO skill ( userid, musicid, version, patterncode, rank,
ratenx
rateex
ratemx
ratetbre
) VALUES
( #{item.userid}, #{item.musicid}, #{item.version}, #{item.patterncode}, #{item.rank}, #{item.rate} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
ratenx = VALUES(ratenx)
rateex = VALUES(rateex)
ratemx = VALUES(ratemx)
ratetbre = VALUES(ratetbre)

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT s.userid, s.rank, CASE WHEN s.patterncode = 1 THEN m.gbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 2 THEN m.gadv WHEN s.patterncode = 3 THEN m.gext WHEN s.patterncode = 4 THEN m.gmas WHEN s.patterncode = 5 THEN m.bbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 6 THEN m.badv WHEN s.patterncode = 7 THEN m.bext WHEN s.patterncode = 8 THEN m.bmas WHEN s.patterncode = 9 THEN m.dbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 10 THEN m.dadv WHEN s.patterncode = 11 THEN m.dext WHEN s.patterncode = 12 THEN m.dmas END AS level FROM skill AS s INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM music ) AS m WHERE s.musicid = m.id AND s.userid = #{uid} AND s.rank = #{rank} AND s.patterncode <= 8 ) AS r
WHERE r.level >= #{level} AND r.level < #{level}+50

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT s.userid, s.rank, CASE WHEN s.patterncode = 1 THEN m.gbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 2 THEN m.gadv WHEN s.patterncode = 3 THEN m.gext WHEN s.patterncode = 4 THEN m.gmas WHEN s.patterncode = 5 THEN m.bbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 6 THEN m.badv WHEN s.patterncode = 7 THEN m.bext WHEN s.patterncode = 8 THEN m.bmas WHEN s.patterncode = 9 THEN m.dbsc WHEN s.patterncode = 10 THEN m.dadv WHEN s.patterncode = 11 THEN m.dext WHEN s.patterncode = 12 THEN m.dmas END AS level FROM skill AS s INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM music ) AS m WHERE s.musicid = m.id AND s.userid = #{uid} AND s.rank = #{rank} AND s.patterncode >= 9 ) AS r
WHERE r.level >= #{level} AND r.level < #{level}+50

SELECT m.id, m.name, s.patterncode, s.playtime FROM music AS m INNER JOIN ( SELECT musicid, patterncode, playtime FROM skill WHERE userid=#{userid} AND playtime > 0 ) AS s WHERE m.id = s.musicid ORDER BY s.playtime DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT m.id, m.name, s.patterncode, s.playtime FROM music AS m INNER JOIN ( SELECT musicid, patterncode, playtime FROM skill WHERE userid=#{userid} AND playtime > 0 and patterncode < 9 ) AS s WHERE m.id = s.musicid ORDER BY s.playtime DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT m.id, m.name, s.patterncode, s.playtime FROM music AS m INNER JOIN ( SELECT musicid, patterncode, playtime FROM skill WHERE userid=#{userid} AND playtime > 0 and patterncode > 8 ) AS s WHERE m.id = s.musicid ORDER BY s.playtime DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT m.id, m.name, s.playtime FROM music AS m INNER JOIN ( SELECT musicid, SUM(playtime) AS playtime FROM skill WHERE userid=#{userid} and playtime > 0 GROUP BY musicid ) AS s WHERE m.id = s.musicid ORDER BY s.playtime DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT c.id as musicid, c.name as mname, c.hurigana as hurigana, c.hot as ishot, c.patterncode as patterncode, c.version as version, b.level as level FROM ( SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, max(level) as level FROM ( SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gbsc as level, 1 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gbsc > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gadv as level, 2 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gadv > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gext as level, 3 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gext > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gmas as level, 4 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gmas > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, bbsc as level, 5 as patterncode FROM music WHERE bbsc > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, badv as level, 6 as patterncode FROM music WHERE badv > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, bext as level, 7 as patterncode FROM music WHERE bext > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, bmas as level, 8 as patterncode FROM music WHERE bmas > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dbsc as level, 9 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dbsc > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dadv as level, 10 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dadv > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dext as level, 11 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dext > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dmas as level, 12 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dmas > 0 AND removed < 1 ) a WHERE a.hot = #{hot} AND
a.patterncode <= 8
a.patterncode >= 9
GROUP BY id ORDER BY level DESC LIMIT 25 ) b INNER JOIN ( SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gbsc as level, 1 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gbsc > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gadv as level, 2 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gadv > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gext as level, 3 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gext > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, gmas as level, 4 as patterncode FROM music WHERE gmas > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, bbsc as level, 5 as patterncode FROM music WHERE bbsc > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, badv as level, 6 as patterncode FROM music WHERE badv > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, bext as level, 7 as patterncode FROM music WHERE bext > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, bmas as level, 8 as patterncode FROM music WHERE bmas > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dbsc as level, 9 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dbsc > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dadv as level, 10 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dadv > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dext as level, 11 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dext > 0 AND removed < 1 UNION SELECT id, name, hurigana, hot, version, dmas as level, 12 as patterncode FROM music WHERE dmas > 0 AND removed < 1 ) c ON b.id = c.id AND b.level = c.level AND
c.patterncode <= 8
c.patterncode >= 9
GROUP BY musicid ORDER BY level DESC
